io.wcm.caravan.rhyme.api.spi

Interface RhymeDocsSupport


  • @ConsumerType
public interface RhymeDocsSupport
    SPI interface to customize the integration of HTML documentation generated with the rhyme-docs-maven-plugin. An instance implementing this interface needs to be provided to the RhymeBuilder.withRhymeDocsSupport(RhymeDocsSupport) method so that "curies" links to the documentation will be added by the AsyncHalResponseRenderer.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String FOLDER
      the folder in the classpath where the generated HTML files are located

    • Field Detail

      • FOLDER

        static final String FOLDER
        the folder in the classpath where the generated HTML files are located
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • getRhymeDocsBaseUrl

        String getRhymeDocsBaseUrl()
        This method allows the framework to construct the full URL from which the documentation will be served, which is important for the curie links to be constructed correctly
        Returns:
        the URL to be prepended to the HTML file name

      • openResourceStream

        InputStream openResourceStream(String resourcePath)
                        throws IOException
        Loads the HTML documentation file from the given path in the class path
        Parameters:
        resourcePath - an absolute path (starting with "/RHYME-DOCS-INF/") to the HTML file to be loaded
        Returns:
        the input stream that provides the file's content (or null if no such file exists)
        Throws:
        IOException - if loading of the file fails

      • isFragmentAppendedToCuriesLink

        boolean isFragmentAppendedToCuriesLink()
        Determines whether a fragment should be included in the documentation link (e.g. /api/docs/YourResource.html#prefix:relation), which immediately opens up the documentation for a given relation. While this does make sense, some tools (e.g. HAL browser) are struggling with this, so it can be disabled
        Returns:
        true if you want the generated links to contain a fragment

      • loadGeneratedHtml

        static String loadGeneratedHtml(RhymeDocsSupport docsSupport,
                                String fileName)
        Extract the HTML documentation that was generated with the rhyme-docs-maven-plugin from the classpath. This default implementation contains additional logic for constructing the full resource path, and some error handling code (to ensure that a HalApiServerException with a reasonable status code will be thrown if HTML could not be loaded)
        Parameters:
        docsSupport - the instance that implements the openResourceStream(String) function
        fileName - the name of the generated file, usually the fully qualified class name of a HalApiInterface, followed by ".html"
        Returns:
        the content of the HTML documentation file (with UTF-8 encoding)
        Throws:
        HalApiServerException - if the documentation could not be found (404 status) or failed to load (500 status)
